message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
I think I can do better than that. How about this?
That's a bit too lopsided, Bob. I'm not sure I'm willing to give you the majority of the pot just yet.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. This split is a bit more in my favor, but I'm still willing to meet you halfway.
I'm not willing to give up that much. I think I can do better than this.
Déjà vu, Bob! This offer is almost identical to the one you made in round 2. I'm not convinced you're willing to meet me halfway.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. This split is a bit more in my favor, but I'm still willing to compromise.
